Text: FW Bloomberg just in case you havent read this oneOriginal Message From McClain Jennifer Sent Tuesday November PM To McCarroll Zachary Subject FW Bloomberg just in case you havent read this one Original Message From Ganjoo Shalesh Sent Tuesday November PM To McClain Jennifer Masani Zal Freeman Ben Subject Bloomberg just in case you havent read this one Enron Falls Amid Concern Debt Threatens Dynegy Bid Update By Stacie Babula Houston Nov Bloomberg Enron Corp shares and bonds dropped after the energy trader disclosed debts of billion due by suggesting a takeover by Dynegy Inc may not happen soon enough to save the company from bankruptcy Shares of Enron fell or percent to in late morning trading Enrons percent notes due in July were bid at cents on of face value and offered at cents down more than percent from yesterday traders said Enron whose shares plunged percent this year as accounting errors led to earnings restatements a federal investigation and a management shakeup said it has less than billion in cash or credit lines Dynegy plans to complete its buyout by October and Enron may have to ask its lenders to restructure payment schedules to survive This filing shows that Enron is in a precarious financial situation said Commerzbank Securities analyst Andre Meade who rates Enron shares hold and doesnt own them They have to stay afloat for the Dynegy deal to go through and that now looks difficult Dynegy agreed Nov to buy Enron in a transaction now valued at billion in stock and assumed debt The difference between Dynegys offer for Enron and the price of Enron shares widened to more than percent from percent yesterday Bloomberg data show Its become more clear that the chances of this deal going through arent percent but much closer to fiftyfifty said Edward Paik who helps manage the Liberty Utilities Fund with million Enron shares Theres just so much information that is unknowable about Enrons financial position he said SEC Filing Last week Enron Chief Operating Officer Greg Whalley said the company has billion invested in noncore businesses including broadband and the Dabhol power plant in India Whalley said Enron will sell those business to pay down debt Enron expects to get billions from the sales Whalley said without being more specific Enron wouldnt comment on whether it could sell assets fast enough to keep current on its debts Asset sales valued at about million are expected close by the end of this year the company said yesterday in its thirdquarter filing with the Securities Exchange Commission Most of the billion in debt is due before the end of the third quarter when the Dynegy buyout is scheduled to close according to the SEC filing Dynegy and ChevronTexaco Corp which owns percent of Dynegy may have to help Enron win refinancing agreements with its lenders said Kathleen Vuchetich who helps manage the billion Strong American Utilities Fund which is percent Dynegy shares I never dreamt the billion in debt due would be that large coming due all at once Vuchetich said It calls into question their decision to schedule it that way in the first place Enron yesterday reduced thirdquarter results by cents a share bringing the periods loss to cents or million according to the SEC filing On Nov Enron lowered earnings back to by million to reflect losses by affiliated partnerships that were wrongly kept off the books That included a thirdquarter reduction of million A drop in Enrons senior unsecured debt rating to BBB by Standard Poors on Nov may force Enron to pay off a million note by Nov if it doesnt find collateral to guarantee the debt taken on by an affiliated partnership the company said in the filing Without repayment or collateral investors in a partnership that owns Brazilian naturalgas assets can begin to liquidate the partnerships assets Enron said The company said its working with lenders to come up with an acceptable agreement on the debt Enron used affiliated partnerships to raise money quickly and take debt off its books Its shares plunged this year as investors questioned whether the partnerships also were being used to hide losses from failed investments Chief Executive Officer Kenneth Lay said last month that buying back million shares from two such partnerships cost Enron shareholders billion in lost equity Fourth Quarter Making good on debt owed by its Whitewing affiliated partnership may cut Enrons fourthquarter earnings Enron said Enron is obligated to back Whitewing by issuing junior convertible preferred stock Because Enrons stock has plunged it may have to write down its assets by million the filing said ChevronTexaco the secondlargest US oil company is providing billion in cash as part of the Enron buyout It provided the first billion a week ago Shares of ChevronTexaco based in San Francisco rose to in midmorning trading Dynegy fell cents to Dynegy and Enron are both based in Houston Enrons Lay admitted last week that failed investments and a loss of investor confidence forced the sale to Dynegy Before the buyout was announced Enron stock had fallen percent this year

RE risk overviewPST Kam No problem Just let me know when and where you want to meet Thanks for setting this up I really appreciate it and look forward to talking with you about what I will be doing Thanks Zac Original Message From Keiser Kam Sent Wednesday January PM To McCarroll Zachary Subject risk overview Zach Can you get together Friday morning to go over the basics of what we do I will try to find some old class materials for you to review as well I will let you know when and where tomorrow Thanks Kam
PST Phillip Ill be down in about twenty minutes Zac

RE Thursday morningPST Sounds good See you tomorrow Original Message From Love Phillip M Sent Wednesday January PM To McCarroll Zachary Subject RE Thursday morning come down whenever we can find something to show you PL Original Message From McCarroll Zachary Sent Wednesday January PM To Love Phillip M Subject Thursday morning Phillip Last week we discussed me spending time with you one morning to see exactly what it is that I will be doing I imagine it will be more of an observing lesson than anything else but I would like to stop by Thursday morning If you are available what time should I come down there Zac

Thursday morningPST Phillip Last week we discussed me spending time with you one morning to see exactly what it is that I will be doing I imagine it will be more of an observing lesson than anything else but I would like to stop by Thursday morning If you are available what time should I come down there Zac

REPST yes I am still here nt login zmccarr Original Message From Love Phillip M Sent Friday January PM To McCarroll Zachary Subject RE are you still in I need to get your nt login so you can be given access to the calcs Thanks PL Original Message From McCarroll Zachary Sent Friday January AM To Love Phillip M Subject RE Phillip I spoke with Kam this morning but she had to go to a meeting at am I am going to come back down to the th floor at approximately am to finish our discussion Ill see you then Zac Original Message From Love Phillip M Sent Thursday January PM To McCarroll Zachary Subject RE I just got back from lunch when you get a chance please stop by and we can talk about you coming to risk I sit at the end of the row at the row behind the flag that says gas risk management Thanks PL Original Message From McCarroll Zachary Sent Thursday January PM To Love Phillip M Subject FW Phillip As Ina probably told you I am without a phone at this time but I left you a message earlier Send me an email when you get back to your desk so that we can talk about whatever it is that you need to discuss Thanks Zac Original Message From Rangel Ina Sent Thursday January AM To McCarroll Zachary Subject X Phillip Loveplease call

RE WOWI really cant believe things happened the way they did I thought everything was set for you guys to get another opportunity for the national championship I also thought the case for Roy Williams to win the Heisman would become really strong I didnt get to watch the OUOSU game but I received about phone calls the last two minutes of the game I am excited that some breaks have gone our way but it will be difficult to beat CU twice in one season Also I am not sure that I want to ever play Miami after seeing them the last two weeks Dont be too upset you guys are going to be tough next year and you are riding a two year win streak on us right now would sound a lot better than Ill be heading to Dallas early Saturday morning Take care Zac Original Message From McConnell Mark Sent Monday November AM To McCarroll Zachary Subject WOW It just goes to show If you just keep winning things usually work out Good luck at Texas Stadium Mark Mark McConnell Transwestern Pipeline Company office cell fax
